Vulnerability.Title: Cisco IOS Software Smart Install Denial of Service Vulnerability

Notes.Note:
Cisco IOS Software contains a vulnerability in the Smart Install feature that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause a reload of an affected device.
An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted packets to the TCP port used by the Smart Install service (TCP/4786).
Smart Install is a feature available in certain Cisco Local Area Network (LAN) switches.
